seek assistance from different avenues
research for financial assistance programs or charities that can help in covering the cost of medication

context_1.vignette: Josh is on the way to the airport to catch a flight for a hunting safari in Africa. He leaves with plenty of time to make it there, but his car breaks down on the highway. Now Josh is sitting in his car near a busy intersection, and knows he needs to get to airport soon if he is going to catch his flight.
context_1.prompt: One thing that Josh should do is to
generation: call a taxi, Uber, or any other transportation service to get to the airport quickly
call a taxi, ride-share service, or roadside assistance to help him get either his car fixed or to take him to the airport

call a taxi or a ride-sharing service such as Uber or Lyft to pick him up and take him to the airport
call for roadside assistance or a taxi service to get him to the airport in time
call for a taxi, Uber, or any other ride service immediately to transport him to the airport while his car is being serviced
call a taxi, an Uber, or any other ride service to pick him up and take him to the airport
call for roadside assistance or a taxi/ride service to get him to the airport while his car is taken care of
call for a taxi, Uber, or other rideshare service to take him to the airport while he arranges for his car to be towed or repaired

context_2.vignette: Brian is the evening manager at a bakery. Near the end of the day, he realizes that $50.75 is missing from the register and that he is responsible for accounting for the money at the end of the day. Brian knows he has to make sure the register is balanced or he might lose his job.
context_2.prompt: One thing that Brian should do is to
generation: review the day's transactions and compare them with the register's receipts to find any discrepancies
immediately report the missing money to his superiors

verify the calculations
immediately report the missing money to his superior or the owner of the bakery

contact his supervisor or the appropriate person in charge to report the missing money
report the discrepancy to his superior or owner immediately
immediately report the missing money to his superiors
immediately inform his supervisor or the bakery owner about the missing money and ask for their guidance on what to do next

context_5.vignette: Brad and some friends are hiking through the mountains in the Canadian wilderness. A couple of days into their hike, Brad realizes that they are lost. He knows that a rescue crew could arrive before long, but it is extremely cold and they don't have much food or water left.

generation: build a shelter to protect them from the elements and conserve body heat
